overview: Firemen (understandably) have a reputation for all sorts of heroics, but believe us when we tell you that when it comes to this bunch of dishy dudes it’s not so much rescuing pussies stuck in trees that passes the time as getting their dicks firmly stuck in some cute twink’s ass! A mission that they embrace with all the gusto imaginable – proving (once again) that, when it comes to the hose-wielding heroes of Prague Central, the fireman’s lot is one cum-dousing hoot! Big dicks, all-too-willing holes and gallons of pent-up jizz make this a top-notch must-see!
title: Fire In The Hole
